body.p:
The MITgcm code and documentation are under continuous development. The last official release was called "Release1_patch8" and the current development is stabilizing in anticipation of a "Release2_beta" announcement. Both the last stable release and the current CVS contents can be obtained at:
Release1_patch8 :
View through an HTML-enabled CVS code browser
Download using CVS pserver:
$ export CVSROOT=':pserver:cvsanon@mitgcm.org:/u/gcmpack' $ cvs login ( enter the CVS password: "cvsanon" ) $ cvs co -r 'release1_p8' MITgcm
Download as a "tar" file.
CVS current :
View through an HTML-enabled CVS code browser
Download using CVS pserver
$ export CVSROOT=':pserver:cvsanon@mitgcm.org:/u/gcmpack' $ cvs login ( enter the CVS password: "cvsanon" ) $ cvs co MITgcm

A GForge-based MITgcm development server is available which includes:
the MITgcm-support mailing list with a web-browsable archive,
a web-based forum suitable for quick questions, and
a HOWTO to help you get started with MITgcm development and customization.
